content:
Then, before heading back to the tent,
I have something to give you,
so please let Mobai know!

<color=#97c344>{homestar} Path</color>,
I've already thought about
how to introduce it to people from other Astralinks.

Oh? I got carried away chatting!
If you're feeling tired, <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>,
feel free to head back to the tent for a quick rest.
